comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The date on the negative is the first game of the 1914 World Series between the Boston Braves and Philadelphia Athletics. The series began at Shibe Park in Philly. I don't understand why this (and the other shots of the Boston playes in this series) is tagged Polo Grounds, presumably by the SABR committee. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1914_World_Series
